caption.p: NMDS representation of (a) soil fungal communities, (b) soil bacterial communities, (c) subordinate fungal taxa, and (d) subordinate bacterial taxa in grassland plots subjected to long‐term climate treatments; ordinations were based on Bray–Curtis dissimilarities and hulls envelope all plots within a treatment, where “C” is control, “H” is heated, “D” is drought, and “W” is watered; significant correlations ( p < .05) between ordination axes and treatments or community‐weighted plant traits are shown as arrows, where “Ccost” is the construction cost of plant material
